title: Cracked Femur Shard
content:
Cracked Femur Shard is an item collected with the Gatherer profession. A Hand Rake is required to harvest. Players recieve ??? xp in Gatherer.

Used with the B.R.E.W.S. Vat to create a reagent used in most early recipes in the Bonewright profession.

Stored in the Bones Bank, currently found in Gnarled Path and Wolves' Den in Hopeforest.

Cracked Femur Shards can be purchased from Jangle's Bone Shop.
